# Copilot Commit Message Convention

All commits in this project must start with one of the following prefixes:

- feat: for new features or significant changes
- docs: for documentation or comment changes
- bufix: for bug fixes

Examples:

- feat: added new chat component
- docs: updated launch instructions
- bufix: fixed bug with message display

**Important:**

- Do not use other prefixes for commits.
- Code comments added for Copilot must also start with one of these words.

_This instruction is mandatory for everyone working with Copilot and git in this project._
